data.title: Still: A Michael J. Fox Movie (2023)
data.shortSummary: A well-told documentary that matches its subject dynamism and effervescent spirit

data.title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines (2021)
data.shortSummary: A heartwarming family film elevated by dynamic and inventive animation

data.title: 20th Century Girl (2022)

data.title: Soul Food (1997)

data.title: Living (2022)
data.shortSummary: Simply told and profoundly moving, this parable covers nothing less than life itself

data.title: Judy Blume Forever (2023)

data.shortSummary: A beautifully powerful and quietly moving film about things left unspoken

data.title: Stutz (2022)
data.shortSummary: An impressive experiment that doubles as a loving tribute and an actually helpful guide on how to be a better person

data.title: Entergalactic (2022)

data.shortSummary: A lovingly-made Canadian comedy-drama

data.shortSummary: Equal parts gorgeous and heartbreaking dance romance from Georgia

data.shortSummary: A tender coming-of-age drama

headline: Popular + Heart-warming
subtitle: Find the best heart-warming movies to watch, from our mood category. Like everything on agoodmovietowatch, these heart-warming movies are highly-rated by both viewers and critics.
